name: UNNotificationActionOptions
desc: The behaviors you can apply to an action.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Initializes an action options object using the specified raw value.

items.name: static var authenticationRequired: UNNotificationActionOptions
items.desc: The action can be performed only on an unlocked device.

items.name: static var destructive: UNNotificationActionOptions
items.desc: The action performs a destructive task.

items.name: static var foreground: UNNotificationActionOptions
items.desc: The action causes the app to launch in the foreground.
